title: Stadia’s ‘Low Change Porting’ will help bring more Windows games from devs like Steel Wool Studios
content:
Google has unveiled it’s latest efforts to make it easier for companies – including Steel Wool Studios, developers of Five Nights at Freddy’s: Security Breach – to port Windows games to Stadia.

more…

The post Stadia’s ‘Low Change Porting’ will help bring more Windows games from devs like Steel Wool Studios appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google has unveiled their latest efforts to make it easier for companies – including Steel Wool Studios – to port Windows games to Stadia.
